doc_string.value:
@notice Modify the reward distributor
    @param _distributor Reward distributor

@notice Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract
    @param _owner Address to have ownership transferred to

natspec.author: Mobius.Fi

add_receiver(address).details: Rewards are distributed evenly between the receivers. Adding a new receiver does not affect the available amount of unclaimed rewards for other receivers.

params._receiver: Address of the new reward receiver

commit_transfer_ownership(address).notice: Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract

params._owner: Address to have ownership transferred to

notify_reward_amount(uint256).details: Only callable by the distributor. Reward tokens are distributed evenly between receivers, over `reward_duration` seconds.
notify_reward_amount(uint256).notice: Transfer new reward tokens into the contract

params._amount: Amount of reward tokens to add

remove_receiver(address).details: Removing a receiver distributes any unclaimed rewards to that receiver.

params._receiver: Address of the reward receiver being removed

set_reward_duration(uint256).details: Only callable when there is not an active reward period
set_reward_duration(uint256).notice: Modify the duration that rewards are distributed over

params._duration: Number of seconds to distribute rewards over

natspec.notice: Evenly streams a reward token to one or more recipients over a predefined period
natspec.title: RewardStream
